recipesJson.name: Sour Apple Cheesecake (Dinner Lady Apple Pie REMIX)
recipesJson.author: Philben29
recipesJson.description:
Very solid clone of Dinner Lady's Apple Pie. Lacking the cinnamon note in DL but I prefer it this way.


Still very much a work in progress, but let me know your thoughts. 

I'm thinking of changing Sugar Cookie to CAP CDS for the cinnamon note, to make it more authentic.



Best after a nice long steep. Throw it in a drawer and forget about it.

reviews.text: The graham cracker is very forward and the apple note is way to light, could use a touch more apple and cinnamon in my opinion. Over all, it is a decent vape, thanks.

pageContext.name: Sour Apple Cheesecake (Dinner Lady Apple Pie REMIX)
